definition: really/sure enough/as expected/if indeed
fruit/result/resolute/indeed/if really
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly

sentences.english: The horse arrived, and it was a rare " thousand-mile".
sentences.chinese: 馬到了，果然是一匹天下少有的千里馬。

sentences.english: Then I looked again and saw that it was in.
sentences.chinese: 然後我再看了一遍，看到果然是壓線。

sentences.english: Sure enough they found a resistant gene.
sentences.chinese: 果然他們發現了一種抗病基因。

sentences.english: But he was right about the legislation’s significance.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於這次立法的重要性，他果然是一語成讖。

sentences.english: Yang Chufu was actually killed a year later.
sentences.chinese: 一年後，陽處父果然被殺。

sentences.english: Sure enough, belts son Bao Arrow extraordinary bravery, skelter.
sentences.chinese: 果然，配帶寶箭的兒子英勇非凡，所向披靡。

sentences.english: Saw the rest several later on live, indeed as expected, you all the way kill into 5 strong.
sentences.chinese: 隨後看了餘下的幾場直播，果然，你一路殺進5強。

sentences.english: We looked out and , by thunder , the ship had gone !
sentences.chinese: 我們跑出去一看，船果然不見了。

sentences.english: Indeed as expected emperor two male sons are more satisfied, know this kind of matter, emperor.
sentences.chinese: 果然帝二夫子更得意了，知道這種事，帝。

sentences.english: They said to Joshua, "The LORD has surely given the whole land into our hands;"
sentences.chinese: 又對約書亞說，耶和華果然將那全地交在我們手中。

sentences.english: It was true. He did have dabs of milk on his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 果然，他的嘴角還留有奶漬。

sentences.english: Day soldiers had held several Oriental army horse to the river to bathe a charger.
sentences.chinese: 日兵們果然拉着幾匹東洋軍馬來河邊給軍馬洗澡了。

sentences.english: Great genes, I muttered to myself.
sentences.chinese: 我不禁喃喃自語，果然是強大的基因。

sentences.english: Sure enough, the horse finished fifth.
We did find two NGOs in Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 果然，我們找到了二個在加爾各達的NGO。

sentences.english: Besides, I really don't care for guys who stink like blood.
sentences.chinese: 並且，我果然對混身披髮着血腥氣的小子沒興趣。

definition: really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
just as expected/told you so
to be worthy of/to deserve to be called/to prove oneself to be
no wonder!/so that's why!
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
(it's) no wonder (that...)/(it's) not surprising (that)
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
to take seriously/serious/No joking, really!
didn't expect
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to appear to be/to seem as if
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
this time
